scripts.start: npm run shared:build && cd server && npm run prod
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run shared:build && npm run server:build:prod && npm run client:build:prod
scripts.server:build:prod: cd server && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.client:build:prod: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 build/**/*.* ../server/dist/client
scripts.shared:build: cd shared && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build && cd dist && cd ../../
